Tomato - Healthy.fun_fact: Tomatoes are technically a fruit, not a vegetable!

Tomato - Leaf Mold.symptoms: Yellow spots on leaves, leading to defoliation.
Tomato - Leaf Mold.treatment: Apply fungicides and improve air circulation.
Tomato - Leaf Mold.fun_fact: Leaf mold thrives in humid conditions.

Tomato - Yellow Leaf Curl Virus.symptoms: Yellowing and curling of leaves, stunted growth.
Tomato - Yellow Leaf Curl Virus.treatment: Control whiteflies and remove infected plants.
Tomato - Yellow Leaf Curl Virus.fun_fact: This virus is spread by whiteflies.

Tomato - Septoria Leaf Spot.symptoms: Small, circular spots with gray centers on leaves.
Tomato - Septoria Leaf Spot.treatment: Remove infected leaves and apply fungicides.
Tomato - Septoria Leaf Spot.fun_fact: Septoria Leaf Spot can reduce tomato yields by up to 50%.

Potato - Healthy.treatment: Maintain proper soil moisture and fertilization.
Potato - Healthy.fun_fact: Potatoes are the world’s fourth-largest food crop.

Potato - Late Blight.symptoms: Dark lesions on leaves and stems, rapid plant death.
Potato - Late Blight.treatment: Apply fungicides and remove infected plants.
Potato - Late Blight.fun_fact: Late blight caused the Irish Potato Famine in the 1840s.

Potato - Early Blight.symptoms: Concentric rings on leaves, reduced yield.
Potato - Early Blight.fun_fact: Early blight is more common in warm, wet climates.

Potato - Scab.treatment: Maintain soil pH and rotate crops.
Potato - Scab.fun_fact: Potato scab makes tubers unmarketable but doesn’t affect taste.

Corn - Healthy.fun_fact: Corn is used in over 4,000 products, from food to fuel.

Corn - Northern Leaf Blight.symptoms: Long, grayish lesions on leaves, reduced photosynthesis.
Corn - Northern Leaf Blight.fun_fact: Northern Leaf Blight can reduce corn yields by up to 30%.

Corn - Common Rust.treatment: Apply fungicides and plant resistant varieties.
Corn - Common Rust.fun_fact: Common rust appears as reddish-brown pustules on leaves.

Corn - Gray Leaf Spot.symptoms: Rectangular lesions on leaves, reduced yield.
Corn - Gray Leaf Spot.fun_fact: Gray Leaf Spot is more severe in conservation tillage systems.

Rice - Healthy.treatment: Maintain proper water levels and fertilization.
Rice - Healthy.fun_fact: Rice feeds over half of the world’s population.

Rice - Blast.treatment: Apply fungicides and plant resistant varieties.
Rice - Blast.fun_fact: Rice blast can cause yield losses of up to 100%.

Rice - Bacterial Leaf Blight.symptoms: Yellow streaks on leaves, reduced photosynthesis.
Rice - Bacterial Leaf Blight.treatment: Apply bactericides and remove infected plants.
Rice - Bacterial Leaf Blight.fun_fact: Bacterial Leaf Blight spreads through water and wind.

Rice - Brown Spot.symptoms: Small, brown spots on leaves, reduced yield.
Rice - Brown Spot.treatment: Apply fungicides and improve soil conditions.
Rice - Brown Spot.fun_fact: Brown Spot is often associated with poor soil conditions.
